name: Baked Lemon Garlic Shrimp
description: Succulent shrimp infused with the brightness of lemon and the richness of garlic, served with a hint of herbs.
recipeIngredient: 1 pound large shrimp, peeled and deveined
recipeInstructions: This simple yet impressive dish requires only a few ingredients and minimal preparation. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). In a medium bowl, whisk together lemon juice, garlic, salt, and pepper. Add the shrimp and toss to coat evenly, then set aside for at least 10 minutes. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil, leaving a small border around edges. Place the marinated shrimp in single layer on the prepared baking sheet. Drizzle olive oil over the shrimp, followed by chopped rosemary. Bake for 12-15 minutes or until pink and cooked through. Serve immediately, garnished with additional rosemary if desired. Enjoy!
